text: Juvana is a Malaysian film based on the action drama series of the same name. The film was released on January 24, 2013. ==Cast== *Johan As'ari as Botak *Zahiril Adzim as Daim *Syazwan Zulkifly as Apek *Adam Shahz as Ayam *Khairul Mohamed as Komeng@Ain *Megat Fazeril Faiz as Kicap *Idzham Ismail as Panjang *Sharnaaz Ahmad as Lan Todak *Syafie Naswip as Jamal *Adlin Aman Ramlie as Warden Tuan Ali *Shera Aiyob as Sara *Sara Ali as Juriah *Rahhim Omar as Pengetua ==Sequels== Two sequels called Juvana 2: Terperangkap Dalam Kebebasan, 2015 and Juvana 3: Perhitungan Terakhir, 2016, have since been released. Category:Malaysian films Category:Malay-language films Category:2013 films Category:Malaysian action films Category:Filmscape films Category:Films produced by Kabir Bhatia Category:Films directed by Faisal Ishak
title: Juvana
